title: Watch live: Trump holds joint press conference with Finnish president
text:
President Trump on Wednesday is set to hold a joint press conference with the president of Finland.

ADVERTISEMENT

Trump will take questions from reporters amid mounting scrutiny regarding his July 25 call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, where he urged the Ukranian leader to investigate former Vice President Joe Biden's role in the firing of a Ukrainian prosecutor. The call has led to an impeachment inquiry in the House.

The press conference with the Finnish president is scheduled to begin at 2 p.m.

Watch live in the video above.
